DOC.brief_summary: This interventional prospective study . The study design evaluate additional benefit combination IPL treatment local application Bromonide 0.33 % gel treatment erythematotelangiectatic ( ETR ) papulopustular ( PPR ) .
DOC.brief_title: Intense Pulsed Light Adjunctive Bromonidine Treatment Rosacea
DOC.detailed_description: Patients would treat full face application bromonide 0.33 % gel daily three month . In addition half patient ' face would subject three IPL treatment session three week apart .
DOC.criteria: patient ( male female ) must 18 yaers old age fulfil one following : 1 . Suffer ETR 2 . Suffer PPR 3 . Suffer combination ETR PPR . 1.Under 18 year old age . 2.Pregnant woman . 3.Systemic treatment rosacea previous six month enrollment . 4.Topical treatment rosacea previous one month enrollment . 5.Phymatous occular rosacae .
